SQL.CREATE_REQUESTS_TABLE: CREATE TABLE `requests` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,`user_name` TEXT,'email' TEXT,`request_id` TEXT,`environment` TEXT,`store` TEXT,`time` DATE,`client_ip` TEXT,`host` TEXT,`method` TEXT,`params_module` TEXT,`params_controller` TEXT,`params_action` TEXT,`params_id` TEXT,`params_oauth_proxy_redirect_host` TEXT,`params_date_count` INTEGER,`params_date_unit` TEXT,`params_date_start` DATE,`params_date_end` DATE,`params_users` TEXT,`params_resource_group` TEXT,`params_sort_measure` TEXT,`path` TEXT,`referrer` TEXT,`ua_os` TEXT,`ua_browser_name` TEXT,`ua_browser_version` TEXT);
SQL.INSERT_REQUESTS: INSERT INTO requests (user_name, email, request_id, environment, store, time, client_ip, host, method, params_module, params_controller, params_action, params_id, params_oauth_proxy_redirect_host,params_date_count,params_date_unit, params_date_start,params_date_end,params_users, params_resource_group,params_sort_measure, path, referrer, ua_os, ua_browser_name, ua_browser_version) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
SQL.ANALYZE_OS: SELECT IFNULL(ua_os,'N/A') AS ua_os, COUNT(*) AS os_count FROM requests GROUP BY ua_os ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 10;
SQL.ANALYZE_BROWSER: SELECT IFNULL(ua_browser_name, 'N/A') AS ua_browser_name, COUNT(*) AS browser_count FROM requests GROUP BY ua_browser_name ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 10;
SQL.ANALYZE_PATHS: SELECT IFNULL("path",'N/A') AS "path", COUNT(*) AS path_count FROM requests GROUP BY "path" ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 10;
SQL.ANALYZE_REFERRERS: SELECT IFNULL(referrer, 'N/A') AS referrer, COUNT(*) AS referrer_count FROM requests WHERE referrer IS NOT NULL AND referrer != "" GROUP BY referrer ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 10;
SQL.ANALYZE_VISITS: SELECT COUNT(*) AS request_count, date(time) AS date_accessed FROM requests GROUP BY date_accessed ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 30;
